Articles.Content:
Strange i havent seen a thread about it here where so much small stuff gets discussed...

What do you think about Witcher 3?

Ive just finished Witcher 2 for the third time, this time from a "perfect" Witcher 1 save, on Dark Mode and with the decisions i wanted to make (2. playthrough was on Roches side to see the other half of the game.). Now that i had my perfect savegame to import i finaly started Witcher 3. Of course i took the highest difficulty setting like in the other games, knowing it wont be easy. But sadly i just cant survive the first ghoul assault just after the beginning...

I think that the controlls are realy ....ed up. The controls of Witcher 2 were perfect, Geralt did exactly what i wanted him to do but now i cant win a fight which would have been over after 10 seconds if i had the Witcher 2 controls back. Maybe i have difficultys to adapt to the new controls after i played Witcher 2 for several hours today, including the two hardest fights in the game. Did the control issues get better for you when you played for a longer time?
